post.author: 코스카
post.content:
Another Job Fair and please give me a feedback....

Hello Everyone;

Not long ago, there was a Job Fair which was addressed in Article #115 below.

There is another Job Fair scheduled for June 18, 4 - 7 P.M. ,and June 19, 11 A.M.- 2 P.M.

and 4 - 7 P.M. at the same location.


If you attended last Job Fair, could you add your opinion to this article please ?

Thank you very much.
post.title: [구게시판]Another Job Fair and please give me a feedback....
